data: The lazy warmth of a May afternoon, the spring following Orn Skinner’s release from Auburn Prison, was reflected in the attitudes of three men lounging on the shore in front of “Satisfied” Longman’s shack.

The lazy warmth of a May afternoon, the spring following Orn Skinner's release from Auburn Prison, was reflected in the attitudes of three men lounging on the shore in front of "Satisfied" Longman's shack.
The Secret of the Storm Country
White, Grace Miller, 1869-1957; Hitchcock, Lucius Wolcott, 1868-1942 [Illustrator]
